translations: v.[粮食]风选；簸去糠皮（winnow 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 风选, 簸扬, 簸谷, 簸去糠皮
火焚末日, 中的火焚末, 末日筛选
风扬机, 风选机, 扇车

sentences.sentence: Thy hair sort-lifted by the winnowing wind;
sentences.translation: 让发丝随着簸谷的风轻飘；

sentences.sentence: But on February 21st two diggers began scooping up and gently winnowing the ground in search of human remains.
sentences.translation: 不过在2月21日，为寻找人类遗骨，两台挖掘机开始铲起并筛掉泥土。

sentences.sentence: The ruthless winnowing of inappropriate offspring can, it seems, also take place well after a fetus has started developing.
sentences.translation: 无情淘汰不合适的后代也可能发生于胎儿开始发育阶段。
